data.title: MITHUN RAJ
data.description: I'm a lead WebApp Developer and Digital Designer building scalable, accessible, and technically tuned brands on the web.

principles.title: Systems-first
principles.description: Building systems for anything from design and development, to scoping and documentation is at the core of my process to driving results for every project I work on.

principles.title: Accessibility and Usability
principles.description: Accessibility and usability are two important principles of front-end development that aim to make a website or web application easy to use and understand for all users, regardless of their abilities, preferences, or devices

principles.title: Performance and Optimization
principles.description: Performance and optimization are two related principles of front-end development that aim to make a website or web application fast and reliable for users.

principles.title: Responsiveness and Cross-Browser Compatibility
principles.description: Responsiveness and cross-browser compatibility are two essential principles of front-end development that aim to make a website or web application adaptable and consistent across different devices and browsers

principles.title: Testing and Debugging
principles.description: Testing and debugging are essential for web development, as they prevent problems, improve user experience, increase trust and ensure the quality.

services.title: Consulting
services.description: Agencies and in-house teams hire me to be embedded on their team for direct support on strategy, scoping, custom code, and training.

services.title: Design
services.description: From strategy and brand, to web and product design, I help teams bring businesses to life with modern, memorable and minimal creative work.

services.title: Development
services.description: With 3+ years creating for the web, I can join your upcoming project to lead development in a design-first, systematic way that will scale with your brand.

data.title: Works
data.description: A collection of some of my favorite Digital Design and Development projects from the past few years. ðŸ¤“

seo.metaDescription: A comprehensive admin dashboard built with Next.js for managing work and travel bookings.

data.title: Worktowander Dashboard
data.description: A comprehensive admin dashboard for managing work and travel bookings. Features include user management, booking system, analytics dashboard, and real-time notifications.
data.longDescription: Worktowander Dashboard is a full-featured administrative interface designed to streamline the management of work and travel bookings. The platform provides an intuitive user experience with advanced filtering, search capabilities, and comprehensive reporting tools. Built with modern web technologies, it ensures fast performance and responsive design across all devices.
data.challenges: Implementing real-time notifications and ensuring optimal performance with large datasets were the main challenges. Solved using WebSocket connections and efficient data caching strategies.
data.solutions: Utilized Next.js API routes for backend functionality, implemented Redis for caching, and used Socket.io for real-time features.

seo.metaDescription: A modern furniture e-commerce platform built with React.js featuring product catalog, shopping cart, and user authentication.

data.title: Furniro
data.description: A modern furniture e-commerce platform with product catalog, shopping cart functionality, and user authentication system.
data.longDescription: Furniro is a comprehensive e-commerce solution for furniture retail, featuring an intuitive product catalog with advanced filtering options, secure shopping cart functionality, and seamless user authentication. The platform provides a smooth shopping experience with responsive design and optimized performance for both desktop and mobile users.
data.challenges: Creating an intuitive product filtering system and implementing a seamless shopping cart experience were key challenges. Solved through state management optimization and user experience design.
data.solutions: Implemented React Context for state management, used localStorage for cart persistence, and created custom hooks for reusable functionality.

seo.metaDescription: A comprehensive library management system built with Next.js for universities to manage books, members, and borrowing operations.

data.title: University Library
data.description: A comprehensive library management system for universities with book catalog, member management, and borrowing operations.
data.longDescription: The University Library Management System is a full-featured platform designed to streamline library operations in educational institutions. It includes comprehensive book catalog management, member registration and tracking, borrowing and return operations, and detailed reporting capabilities. The system ensures efficient library operations with user-friendly interfaces for both librarians and students.
data.challenges: Managing complex book borrowing logic and implementing fine calculation systems were challenging. Solved through robust database design and business logic implementation.
data.solutions: Used Next.js API routes for backend operations, implemented proper authentication, and created comprehensive data validation systems.

seo.metaDescription: An interactive online learning platform built with Vue.js for students and tutors to connect and engage in educational activities.

data.title: E-tutor
data.description: An interactive online learning platform connecting students with tutors for personalized educational experiences.
data.longDescription: E-Tutor is a comprehensive online learning platform that bridges the gap between students and qualified tutors. The platform features video conferencing capabilities, interactive whiteboards, progress tracking, and personalized learning paths. Built with modern web technologies, it provides a seamless educational experience with real-time collaboration tools and comprehensive assessment systems.
data.challenges: Implementing real-time video conferencing and interactive whiteboard features were complex challenges. Solved using WebRTC technology and canvas-based drawing systems.
data.solutions: Integrated WebRTC for video calls, used Socket.io for real-time communication, and implemented canvas API for interactive whiteboard functionality.
